text: hey rdio users, is the UI different as of last update? I'm seeing a lot of angry folks on the tweets
yeah they just rolled out a huge update on the mac app
combined "heavy rotation" and "new releases", which i dislike
I didn't want to say anything as to not be _that person_ but yeah, my first impression is that I hate it
I'm gonna give it a little time though.
It's confusing, and it has infinity scroll with random content on the Home page which sucks
they also replaced the concept of "this is in my collection" with "this is my favorite!"
I asked because I always got the feeling that their UX made up for any shortcomings in the service, but lots of ppl i know are suddenly very angry
It seems like a big uprooting from what we've come to know and love.
yeah the favorite thing is uncomfortable to have forced on me all the sudden.
they also seem to have completely removed the "what are my friends listening to?" sidebar. hooray minimalism?
No I think that's on the home page... or the people section?
yeah but they removed the righthand column showing that info at a glance
now you have to click through

The new features feel bloated to me. I think I don't like it because it's something I will very clearly have to work at to understand and become comfortable with. It's not very straightforward (mostly talking about the Home section).
